title: Dairying in Australia
brief_description: Shows the work of a typical Victorian dairy farm throughout the year, the bulk handling and processing, distribution and export of dairy products. Filmed on locations at Hunterfield Jersey Stud, Kiewa Milk Supply and Murray Valley Irrigation. Commentary by Roger Climpson.
